title: 75% of tech leaders plan GenAI implementation within next year: report
description: The report says that the business leaders identified technological disruption as the top external factor impacting their business in the coming two years, putting emphasis on the race toward AI supremacy to improve business efficiencies and reduce costs.
content: With artificial intelligence (AI) gaining prominence in businesses, seventy-five per cent of technology leaders are exploring Generative AI for implementation within the next year, according to Experian's report conducted by Forrester Consulting.
